imdb.plot outline: Two hugely popular, award winning TV ONE series together in one pack. Marcus Lush, one of New Zealands favourite broadcasters takes us on a personal journey of exploration, firstly through the bottom of the South Island in South, then through to the top of the North Island in North. Featuring stunning scenery, breathtaking cinematography, colourful characters and above all Marcus very own brand of unique narration, as he takes the road less travelled to showcase some of the best New Zealand has to offer. NORTH: From lighthouses to lava flows, kayaks to kiwis, beaches to butterflies, Marcus covers a lot of ground - and water - in his latest adventure about New Zealands special places and people. Marcus becomes intimately involved in the stories of the landscape and the people that populate it, as he undertakes a journey that travels the coasts and harbours, the hills and sand dunes, of the top of the North Island.
imdb.title: North
plot: Two hugely popular, award winning TV ONE series together in one pack. Marcus Lush, one of New Zealands favourite broadcasters takes us on a personal journey of exploration, firstly through the bottom of the South Island in South, then through to the top of the _North_ (qv) Island in _North_ (qv). Featuring stunning scenery, breathtaking cinematography, colourful characters and above all Marcus very own brand of unique narration, as he takes the road less travelled to showcase some of the best New Zealand has to offer. NORTH: From lighthouses to lava flows, kayaks to kiwis, beaches to butterflies, Marcus covers a lot of ground - and water - in his latest adventure about New Zealands special places and people. Marcus becomes intimately involved in the stories of the landscape and the people that populate it, as he undertakes a journey that travels the coasts and harbours, the hills and sand dunes, of the top of the _North_ (qv) Island.::berthine
